Name: Strike
Description: Deal 2 damage. Deal 4 damage instead if you have played an another action this turn with your partner's icon.

Name: Tailwhip
Description:
Deal 1 damage to two different enemies.
Rotate an action or resource on the field.

Name: Sideswipe
Description: Deal 3 damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.

Name: Tempt
Description:
Draw all the cards in your partner's hand.
Your partner performs their draw ability.
Lose 2 vitality.

Name: Spit Venom
Description:
Deal 2 damage to one enemy. That enemy can't attack this turn.
OR
Remove 3 time counters.
